meanings.definition: The sensation of wanting to scratch a part of the skin.
meanings.sent1: Her itchings were so intense that she couldn't resist scratching.
meanings.sent2: The itchings on his arm made him reach for the lotion.
meanings.sent3: His itchings were like tiny ants crawling under his skin.
meanings.sent4: The itchings in her mind urged her to take action.
meanings.sent5: The itchings felt like a persistent tickle that demanded attention.

meanings.definition: A strong desire or urge to do something.
meanings.sent1: The itchings to explore the unknown drove him to travel the world.
meanings.sent2: Her itchings for success motivated her to work hard.
meanings.sent3: His itchings for adventure were like a fire burning inside him.
meanings.sent4: The itchings in his heart pushed him to follow his dreams.
meanings.sent5: The itchings for change bubbled up within her, urging her to take a leap.
